suppress.notes: We do not use: Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE + Spring Security (any version), see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258 False positive confirmed. Last control version: 5.5.1

These CVE's are coming from Dhowden tag library and it impacts only MP3/MP4/OGG/FLAC metadata parsing library. Also it is declared as false positive in https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/3043 Last control version: 1.5
Declared as False Positive on com.nimbusds:oauth2-oidc-sdk #2866 https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/2866 Last control version: 9.10.1
Elasticsearch versions before 7.13.3 and 6.8.17 an uncontrolled recursion vulnerability Suppressed until fix in place

A vulnerability in all versions of Nim-lang allows unauthenticated attackers to write files to arbitrary directories via a crafted zip file with dot-slash characters included in the name of the crafted file
